name: boilerplate-node-api
author: Mateus Perdig√£o Domiciano
keywords: A nice generator that creates an express application using clean architecture

scripts.version:major: npm version major --force -m 'Updating the project major version %s'
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --force -m 'Updating the project minor version %s'
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --force -m 'Updating the project patch version %s'
